Uses of Class
alston.minecraft.Block

    • Uses of Block in alston.minecraft

      Subclasses of Block in alston.minecraft 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CraftingTable
      A Clickable Block that can show a Window (Showable) to craft Items.
      class  Torch
      An Object of this class represents a torch: A Block that does not naturally spawn (must be crafted).
      Methods in alston.minecraft that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Block Utility.getBlock(float x, float y, float z)
      Gets the Block from the given 3D co-ordinate space location.
      Block Chunk.getBlock(int x, int y, int z)
      Gets the Block in the specified coordinates (allows for negatives) from the Chunk by using a divide and conquer search algorithm.
      Block[][][] Chunk.getBlocks() 
      Block Light.getOrigin() 
      Block BlockFactory.makeBlock(int type)
      Creates a Block of the specified type ONLY IF it is subtype of Block, for efficiency purposes (prevents unneccesary mallocs and frees)
      Methods in alston.minecraft with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Item.drop(Block block)
      When the Item is dropped without force.
      Constructors in alston.minecraft with parameters of type Block 
      Constructor and Description
      Light(Block origin, float intensity, float decay)
      Creates a new light at the specified location and properties.
